titleStmt.title: Londini artium & scientiarum scaturigo. Or, Londons fountaine of arts and sciences Exprest in sundry triumphs, pageants, and showes, at the initiation of the Right Honorable Nicholas Raynton into the Maiorty of the famous and farre renowned city London. All the charge and expence of the laborious proiects both by water and land, being the sole vndertaking of the Right Worshipfull Company of the Haberdashers. Written by Thomas Hayvvood.
titleStmt.author: Heywood, Thomas, d. 1641.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
